text: Vera Drake is a 2004 British French period drama movie directed by Mike Leigh and starring Imelda Staunton, Phil Davis, Daniel Mays, Sandra Voe, Eddie Marsan, Adrian Scarborough, Heather Craney, Sally Hawkins, Gerard Monaco, Ruth Sheen, Jim Broadbent, Lesley Manville, Lesley Sharp. It was nominated for 3 Academy Awards in 2005. ==Other websites== * * Category:2004 drama movies Category:2000s British drama movies Category:French drama movies Category:Movies directed by Mike Leigh
title: Vera Drake
